actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Flood Disaster Protection Act of 1973 to permit banks, savings and loan associations, and similar institutions to lend funds secured by real estate not insured under the provisions of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968.

summary.text: Permits, under the Flood Disaster Protection Act, banks, savings and loan associations, and similar institutions to lend funds secured by real estate or mobile homes not insured with flood insurance or under the provisions of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Flood Disaster Protection Act of 1973 to permit banks, savings and loan associations, and similar institutions to lend funds secured by real estate not insured under the provisions of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968.
